messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
{~J0(3.0)}But I'm beat.{~N}I thought I was a goner there.{~E}
{~J1(3.0)}So, how'd it go?{~N}Did you find a way out?
{~J1(1.8)}But it's too soon to give up.
{~J1(3.4)}A military rescue squad{~N}should be here any time now.
{~J1(2.8)}If they come through the town,{~N}we're home free.
{~J1(3.4)}This isn't the time to stand{~N}around flapping our gums.{~E}
Looks like it's full of stuff...{~E}
{~C3}He came by. I handed over the{~N}package that the woman left here.
{~C3}Don't want to be involved with{~N}the likes of them anymore, but...
{~C3}I'm getting creeped out{~N}even more than before.
{~C3}Thought of leaving town, but{~N}I'm afraid of what will happen{~N}if I do.{~E}
{~C3}3 loaves of bread.{~N}3 cartons of milk.{~N}2 dozen eggs.
{~C3}Deliver to back door daily 8 a.m.{~N}Rear entrance code 0886{~N}                        Norman Young{~E}
There is a drawer.{~N}Do you want to open it?{~S4}
